game.name: Super Sniper Assassin
game.description:
The best action packed challenge has already hit the virtual gaming world! Where you are guys? Join Super Sniper Assassin and gear up to use your rifle in the best possible way to aim your target! You cannot say to this brand new action game since no other platform will allow you to practice your shooting skills this way. Make sure to do your homework carefully in advance before entering each level. Finish your target with just one shot to clear the level!

Sometimes you can shoot your target without moving your curser, while you will have to run or move on the other time. Be ready to fight against the distance and wind in the advanced level of this HTML5 shooting game! Try to react fast before your target escape from the screen! Of course, your fast thinking and nice aiming abilities will help you to guide through all the levels. The best part is that even a little practice will make your way to become a professional killer.

Lots of waiting, precision and some patience will be enough to help you complete your goal. Try to attempt each target without making any mistakes! Grab your rifle, aim your target and head on to pull the trigger at the right time! Kill your every target that you see on the screen through multiple levels! This cool shooter challenge features 20 unique and addictive levels to play through. Spot a person, aim for their head and do not delay in shooting their head! The top right corner of the screen will show you the direction and strength of the wind. Take them down all to get more rewards!
